title.i: Sale or Contribution of Assets between an Investor and its Associate or Joint Venture

body.p: Sale or Contribution of Assets between an Investor and its Associate or Joint Venture, which amends IFRS 10 and IAS 28, was issued in September 2014. The amendments address the conflict between the requirements in IFRS 10 Consolidated Financial Statements and IAS 28 Investments in Associates and Joint Ventures when accounting for the sale or contribution of a subsidiary to a joint venture or associate (resulting in the loss of control of the subsidiary). In December 2015 the IASB deferred the effective date of this amendment indefinitely.
